about.details:
Incorporated in 2018, Delhi based Gleam Fabmat Limited is a company engaged in the trading of a wide range of aluminium products such as Aluminium Sheets, Aluminium Coils, Rivets and textiles products.

The Company plans to leverage its promoter networks in the trading community to grow its business. It has expanded its verticals by venturing into Fabric segment. It is also developing a strong team to meet its proposed operational needs.

In the first four months of its operations, the company has posted sales, EBITDA and PAT as Rs. 1,022.22 lakhs, Rs. 30.82 lakhs and Rs. 20.99 lakhs respectively.

faqs.question: What is the Gleam Fabmat IPO?
faqs.answer:
Gleam Fabmat IPO is a SME IPO of 3120000 equity shares of the face value of ₹10 aggregating up to ₹3.12 Crores. The issue is priced at ₹10 per share. The minimum order quantity is 10000.

The IPO opens on February 19, 2019, and closes on February 22, 2019.

Bigshare Services Pvt Ltd is the registrar for the IPO. The shares are proposed to be listed on BSE SME.

faqs.question: How to apply in Gleam Fabmat IPO through Zerodha?
faqs.answer:
Zerodha customers can apply online in Gleam Fabmat IPO using UPI as a payment gateway. Zerodha customers can apply in Gleam Fabmat IPO by login into Zerodha Console (back office) and submitting an IPO application form.

Steps to apply in Gleam Fabmat IPO through Zerodha

  1. Visit the Zerodha website and login to Console.
  2. Go to Portfolio and click the IPOs link.
  3. Go to the 'Gleam Fabmat IPO' row and click the 'Bid' button.
  4. Enter your UPI ID, Quantity, and Price.
  5. Submit IPO application form.
  6. Visit the UPI App (net banking or BHIM) to approve the mandate.

Visit Zerodha IPO Application Process Review for more detail.

faqs.question: When Gleam Fabmat IPO will open?
faqs.answer: The Gleam Fabmat IPO opens on February 19, 2019 and closes on February 22, 2019.

faqs.question: What is the lot size of Gleam Fabmat IPO?
faqs.answer: Gleam Fabmat IPO lot size is 10000, and the minimum amount required is ₹1,00,000.

faqs.question: How to apply for Gleam Fabmat IPO?
faqs.answer: You can apply in Gleam Fabmat IPO online using either UPI or ASBA as a payment method. ASBA IPO application is available in the net banking of your bank account. UPI IPO application is offered by brokers who don't offer banking services. Read more detail about applying IPO online through Zerodha, Upstox, 5Paisa, Nuvama, HDFC Bank, and SBI Bank.

faqs.question: When is Gleam Fabmat IPO allotment?
faqs.answer: The finalization of Basis of Allotment for Gleam Fabmat IPO will be done on Wednesday, February 27, 2019, and the allotted shares will be credited to your demat account by Friday, March 1, 2019. Check the Gleam Fabmat IPO allotment status.

faqs.question: When is Gleam Fabmat IPO listing date?
faqs.answer: The Gleam Fabmat IPO listing date is on Tuesday, March 5, 2019.
